ALTERNATIVES_PAGE.TITLE: Alternative Logo Websites
ALTERNATIVES_PAGE.INFO_BOX_HTML: These are some vastly inferior competitors to LogoSearch.  Use them at your own risk!

IMAGE_PAGE.INFO_BOX_HTML: This only shows logos named exactly {{name}}. Try Searching to find more logos with similar names.
IMAGE_PAGE.TITLE: {{name}} SVG Logos - Logo Search

IMAGES_PAGE.TITLE: Most Common Logo Names
IMAGES_PAGE.INFO_BOX_HTML:
These are the {{numValues, addCommas}} most common logos.
  • {{imageCount, addCommas}} logos
  • {{sourceCount, addCommas}} different sources
  • {{uniqueCount, addCommas}} distinct names
  • {{singleSourceCount, addCommas}} names appear in only one source.
With this many logos, I strongly recommend using the Search page to find a logo.

SEARCH_PAGE.TITLE: LogoSearch: Instant logo search for SVG logos
SEARCH_PAGE.META_DESCRIPTION: Instant logo search for SVG logos with {{imageCount, addCommas}} logos from {{sourceCount, addCommas}} sources.

SOURCES_PAGE.TITLE: Logo Sources
SOURCES_PAGE.INFO_BOX_HTML: Submit additional sources on Github., and try some alternatives.
